Straightshot continues bravely as she gets into robot mode, while thrusting=
 out her right shoulder as a carpet of quills attempts to shoot back at Sab=
erback, hopefully making a direct hit to his face!  She knew the face was m=
ost vulnerable and hoped to hit him there.

" Seriously?!  Get real!  STRAI=
GHTSHOT MAXIMIZE! " 

Quickstride's stomach begins to rumble rather loud as=

rs up.

"Uh Ohhh..  I think I overdosed on those bean pods...  INCOMING!"

=
His tail raises as a huge cloud of green smog is released in the Sharkitcon=
s direction.  Rattrap holds his nose as he fends off his enemy.

" PU!  I'm=
 glad I'm mostly down wind of that.  But those creeps might not be so lucky=
.   Sheesh, that's worse than tear gas."

Meanwhile, Tucson manages to elud=
e Magmatrons sword with a quick crouching maneuver, and then a series of le=
aps and backflips. 

" Again you don't seem to understand Magmatron. Size i=
s not everything.   But cunning can be."

While in flight, Tucson breaks of=
f a stalactite and attempts to lodge it in between Magmatrons sword arm, at=
 the shoulder joint!  While doing so he soars over the larger warrior with =
great agility.
